comments.body: Also note that if resourceVersion is empty, it will provide strong consistency guarantee.

Hmm... This approach has a limitation that we have to put suggestion always at the end of the arg list. I have no strong opinion on this though... GU is not clean already. We really should clean this up at some point.

/cc @hongchaodeng
personally, I'd prefer to leave this as an interface.
(just remove the trigger method if you don't need it any more)
Why are you keeping this type at all instead of making everything use SelectionPredicates?

Right. We will use SelectionPredicate everywhere.
The filter is kept here for intermediate stage of change.
